thread.title: Martellus Bennett danced with Patriots cheerleaders after their win like nobody was watching
thread.title_full: Martellus Bennett danced with Patriots cheerleaders after their win like nobody was watching

author: Harry Lyles Jr.
title: Martellus Bennett danced with Patriots cheerleaders after their win like nobody was watching
text:
The music was great, too.
The Patriots are headed to their seventh Super Bowl appearance under Bill Belichick and Tom Brady. In their cast of characters, there are some new faces, like Martellus Bennett .
After the win, Bennett made sure to have fun in celebrating, so with his championship hat on, he went over to the cheerleaders, grabbed some pom poms, and danced to Whitney Houston’s “I Wanna Dance With Somebody.”
. @MartysaurusRex just wants to have fun #NFLPlayoffs pic.twitter.com/njTCMY8sOk 
— NFL (@NFL) January 23, 2017 These really are the best moments, when you dance like nobody is watching. Marty B really didn’t care at all:
You're going to want to check out our Snap story for more of this: 

: patriots pic.twitter.com/CKy6AWwe5N 
— New England Patriots (@Patriots) January 23, 2017 Surely there are people out there jealous and tired of the Patriots’ success, but you can’t help but feel good for a guy like Martellus Bennett.
